sen.j: 楠木 正顯（くすのき まさあき）は室町時代の武将。
sen.e: Masaaki (正顯) KUSUNOKI was a busho (Japanese military commander) in Muromachi period.
Masaaki (正顯) KUSUNOKI was a busho (Japanese military commander) in Muromachi period.
Masaaki (正顯) KUSUNOKI was a busho (Japanese military commander) in Muromachi period.
He also used kanji 正顕 (Masaaki) for his name.
He also used kanji 正顕 (Masaaki) for his name.
He also used kanji 正顕 (Masaaki) for his name.
He was a son of Masakatsu KUSUNOKI.
He was a son of Masakatsu KUSUNOKI..
sen.cmt: ピリオドを追加しました。
sen.e: He was a son of Masakatsu KUSUNOKI..
He was the founder of Ise Kusunoki clan.
He was the founder of Ise Kusunoki clan.
He was the founder of Ise Kusunoki clan.

sen.j: 応永の乱で敗れた後、南朝方に助け出され伊勢国神戸 (三重県)に移住。
sen.e: After he lost in Oei War, he was rescued by the Southern Court and moved to Kobe (Mie Prefecture), Ise province.
After he lost in Oei War, he was rescued by the force of the Southern Court and moved to Kanbe, Ise Province (Mie Prefecture).
sen.cmt: the Sourthern Court の前にthe force of を挿入しました。KobeをKanbeとしました。(Mie Prefecture)を文末に移動しました。
sen.e: After he lost in Oei War, he was rescued by the force of the Southern Court and moved to Kanbe, Ise Province (Mie Prefecture).

sen.j: 以後正顯の系統はこの地に根付いた。
sen.e: Since then Masaaki's lineage settled in the land.
Since then Masaaki's lineage settled in the land.
Since then Masaaki's lineage settled in the land.
